title: luckypenguin
author: luckypenguin
content: I've been playing online casino slot machines for a while now, and I'm looking for advice on which ones are the best. I like to play the ones with lots of different payouts and bonuses, but sometimes the games take a long time to load. Do you have any suggestions for me?

comments.author: Iron Fist
comments.body: Quote from: luckypenguin on September 12, 2022, 05:19:47 PMI've been playing online casino slot machines for a while now, and I'm looking for advice on which ones are the best. I like to play the ones with lots of different payouts and bonuses, but sometimes the games take a long time to load. Do you have any suggestions for me?When it comes to choosing which online casino to play at, there are a lot of factors to take into consideration. The design and the in-game experience are important, but you also need to know that the casino will let you actually take your winnings and that they will be paid in a timely manner. Ultimately, there's no one right answer, so it's best to spend some time reading reviews and finding out what their experiences have been before deciding where to play. These reviews will give you a good idea of how each casino works and if it's worth your time or not.By the way, I think this topic is better suited for Gambling board.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Personally been a long time user of NitrogenSports. UI/UX sucks, but it works decently based on my experience.P.S. I've heard a lot of complaints about it, though I personally haven't had any issues. dyor.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Check out this thread: How to choose a casino?And this for the list of bonuses you can get when playing on a specific casino: Loyalty Bonuses & Promotions on Crypto Casinos and SportsbooksAlmost all of the casino here offer slot games, so I don't think there will be some sort of recommendations here. Just pick based on your preferences.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: You can visit BTCGosu. They have a lot of casino reviews so I think something would suit your taste, especially since you'd still have to do your own testing (especially in the cases of country regulations/KYCs). Latest I've used was Rollbit and Stake, which is pretty standard among the choice simo. Quote from: luckypenguin on September 12, 2022, 05:19:47 PMI like to play the ones with lots of different payouts and bonuses, but sometimes the games take a long time to load. Are you sure the issue was with the casino/website and not on your side? Might want to check your internet speed first or something. Never had any issues or problems in terms of loading in websites.

comments.body: Based on your post it seems you're looking for the most fastest casino, isn't? I think Bitcasino and Stake are currently become the fast and clean casinos. If you're looking for different payout and bonuses, I think there's a single casinos will offer the whole promotion at one time. You're need to try other casino too like Roobet, Duelbits, Rollbit etc that offering different bonuses.
